protein.specific_function: Induces cartilage and bone formation. May be the osteoinductive factor responsible for the phenomenon of epithelial osteogenesis. Plays a role in calcium regulation and bone homeostasis

reference.reference_text: Ozkaynak E, Rueger DC, Drier EA, Corbett C, Ridge RJ, Sampath TK, Oppermann H: OP-1 cDNA encodes an osteogenic protein in the TGF-beta family. EMBO J. 1990 Jul;9(7):2085-93.
